content: In case, just in case you don't wanna grow any mah... {A想到了}What if I plant a few sproutsies out front?
info: 云果小故事-种子成长_云果故事线

content: It's been very, very long since I planted somethin' with anyone...{短暂停} You remind me of how nice it feels to share the work. Thank you! <style=SizeSmall>For being the sun that's always there for me.</style>
info: 云果小故事-种子成长_云果故事线

content: Then you can just come by my place and pick whatever you want to eat. And if what I'm growin' ever causes trouble in the neighborhood, just tell me, and I'll stop.
info: 云果小故事-种子成长_云果故事线

content: {A惊叹}I think it made me even happier than doin' it alone, and even more...{短暂停} <style=SizeBig>rewardin'!</style>
info: 云果小故事-种子成长_云果故事线

content: {A歪头}I was being kinda stubborn before. Livin' on my own doesn't mean doin' everything all alone, and it sure doesn't mean I gotta stay lonely.
info: 云果小故事-种子成长_云果故事线

content: Learnin' to work together and help each other... that's a part of becomin' independent too mah.
info: 云果小故事-种子成长_云果故事线

content: {A笑眯眯}Just like before, I've picked out nice lickle passion fruit seeds for you. Take 'em, so when you feel like eatin' some, you can grow your own too.
info: 云果小故事-种子成长_云果故事线

content: {A笑眯眯}<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, I might just keep "troubling" you in the days to come~
info: 云果小故事-种子成长_云果故事线

content: I used to grow everythin' myself then share it with you. But this time, you were right there with me. We figured it out together.
info: 云果小故事-种子成长_云果故事线

content: {A笑眯眯}<style=PlayerName>{玩家昵称}</style>, come 'ere, come 'ere~! I've totally figured out passion fruit. Look!
info: 云果小故事-种子成长_云果故事线

content: I planted some right outside my house, <style=SizeBig>and they're all bearin' fruit!</style> Lemme pick one for ya!
info: 云果小故事-种子成长_云果故事线

content: This one's the best of the bunch. It's so sweet and so purty. Give it a bite...{短暂停} Good thing I didn't give up on it... No, WE didn't give up on it.
info: 云果小故事-种子成长_云果故事线
